thread.title: UPDATE 1-Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway nearing deal to buy Precision Castparts - WSJ
thread.title_full: UPDATE 1-Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway nearing deal to buy Precision Castparts - WSJ | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: UPDATE 1-Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway nearing deal to buy Precision Castparts - WSJ
text:
(Adds possible timing and size of deal)
Aug 8 (Reuters) - Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway Inc is nearing a deal to buy Precision Castparts Corp , in an acquisition that could be valued at more than $30 billion, the Wall Street Journal reported on Saturday, citing people familiar with the matter.
The deal for Precision Castparts, which makes aircraft components and energy-production equipment, could be announced next week, the people told the WSJ.
The deal would rank as the largest for Berkshire, the WSJ reported.
Berkshire was not immediately available for comment.
(Reporting by Jennifer Ablan in New York; Writing by Lisa Shumaker; Editing by Alison Williams )
